talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CustomSavsaaba>Sav'saaba! Did you sleep well?


Gerudo Town is lively, even at night!<sp:5:0:0>
Have fun out there!
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Are you more rested and revitalized?
Come back whenever you feel tired!
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CustomSavotta>Sav'otta! You look like the very image of
relaxation! If you're going to venture into
the desert, make sure you're prepared!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CustomSavaaq>Sav'aaq! You look like the very image
of relaxation!

The heat of the desert is dangerous at
this time of day.<sp:5:0:0> Be careful if you're
planning to go out there!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CustomSavsaaba>Sav'saaba! You look like the very image
of relaxation!

Gerudo Town is lively, even at night!<sp:5:0:0>
Have fun out there!
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Understand>Aw, you're not interested? That's too
bad—it's not every day that I get to host
a voe, after all.
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm... I suppose Olu could use
some practice.

She's still learning, so she sometimes
doesn't get everything quite right. But
I would discount the spa plan for you!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>It's you! You're pretty amazing, you know
that? I heard you helped the chief and the
others save the town!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I bet the benefits of my spa plan played
at least a small part in that, huh?

As usual, I'm booked solid right now. But
I'll always make an exception for you—the
spa plan is yours whenever you like!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's the least I can do! Just let me know
when you want to relax!
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>It's you! You're pretty amazing, you know
that? I heard you helped the chief and the
others save the town!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>As usual, I'm booked solid right now, but
I'll always make an exception for you—the
spa plan is yours whenever you like!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>It's the least I can do! Just let me know
when you want to relax!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Come now, don't worry yourself!
You deserve a rest!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>You're not familiar with the spa plan?


Ah, I suppose I shouldn't be surprised.
A voe wouldn't know much about our
town, after all...
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS>Anyway, the spa plan we offer will fill you
with energy and a truly unique feeling of
resilience to great dangers.
And as an extra bonus, it'll feel like years
of worry have been washed away, leaving
your skin bright and smooth.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Show me someone who wouldn't
appreciate that, and I'll show you
someone who's wrong, haha!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Intriguing, right? What do you think?
The standard stay is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, and the
spa plan is <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Notice>What's this... You don't have enough
money! You can't stay if you can't pay
for it...
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Oh...just the standard stay, huh?


Passing on the chance to skip the line for
the spa plan?<sp:5:0:0> All right, I guess...
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>The spa plan it is!<sp:5:0:0> Hee-hee, I'm so excited
to get to work...
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, and of course you can choose when
you'd like your wake-up call to be.
What were you thinking?
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CustomSavotta>Sav'otta! Did you sleep well? If you're
going to venture into the desert, make
sure you're prepared!
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're the chief's guest, right? Since it's
a special occasion, would you like to try
my spa plan?
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I used to run a shop on the surface, but...


what with the sand shroud and then
those monsters appearing, the guards
told me to evacuate.
I had six months' worth of reservations
booked, but obviously those haven't been
happening. I'm a bit out of practice...
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But good news for you, I guess! You can
rest, or you can take advantage of the spa
plan without having to wait!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>The standard stay is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, and the
spa plan is <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Living in an underground shelter takes
more of a toll on the mind and body
than you would think...
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But with my spa plan, you can send both
on a relaxing journey!
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Were you interested in a different option?


The standard stay is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, and the
spa plan is <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hey! You! Aren't you the voe who helped
the chief and the others save the town?!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm glad you came! While we are an inn,
we also have a spa plan available.

It's a really popular part of the inn.
In fact, there's always a long list
of reservations.
But you did save the town, after all, so
you're a bit of a special case... You can
skip the line whenever you want!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's the least I can do! Just let me know
when if you want to relax!
talk0006: <sp:3:0:2:0701>How about it? Do you want to rest here?
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>When I was still running my shop on the
surface, I had a very...enthusiastic client.

I had to shut down and move here without
any warning though... I hope she's doing
all right.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well...<sp:5:0:0> Worrying isn't going to get me
anywhere. All I can do right now is help
those who are down here.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You did save the town, after all, so
you're a bit of a special case... You can
skip the line whenever you want!
It's the least I can do! Just let me know
when you want to relax!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I had a feeling I'd be seeing you right
about now!

I bet you're feeling more worn out than
a sand seal after a long race, huh?
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:CustomSavaaq>Sav'aaq! Did you sleep well?


The heat of the desert is dangerous at
this time of day.<sp:5:0:0> Be careful if you're
planning to go out there!
